column4: after a major upgrade (mainly kde 4.2), my dns service doesn't work now
i can use proxy software such as tor to get online
i wonder if anyone has the same problem
how do i check my network configuration? i can't resolve any domain name directly now
it looks like it's a virus!
looks like a virus edited my resolv.conf and wrote "nameserver 192.168.1.1"
uhm, no. it was written by networkmanager when you recieved an ip address from your dhcp server
so whatever nameservers your router is using aren't working
but another computer in my home can resolve domain names
how do i check if it's my machine's software fault?
connection timed out; no servers could be reached
